SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
GameController, responsible for modifying the model according to the input from the player views.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GameController(GameModel model)
    Mock GameController constructor for testing purposes.
    This hooks empty listeners to the model to avoid problems when it tries to send data to a client
    GameController(GameModel model, int lobbyID)
    Initialize the controller with the given model and start the game.
    This constructor is used when the game is started from the lobby, whether it's a new game or a recovery.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    calculateAdjacency(Shelf shelf)
    Compute shelf adjacency score for the final score.
    void
    endGame()
    Notify the views of the game ending.
    Sets the model's state to GameEnded and shuts down the lobby.
    boolean
    needRefill()
    Check if the board needs to be refilled according to the rules (either empty or all tiles isolated)
    void
    nextPlayerSetter()
    Move over to the next player.
    If this looped back to the first player during the last turn, end the game.
    void
    onMessage(ChatMessage chat)
    Respond to a chat message received from a client
    void
    onMessage(DebugMessage message)
    Respond to a debug ping from a client by notifying it back.
    void
    onMessage(MoveMessage msg)
    Respond to a move message received from a client
    In case of error, notify the client through the model with a ServerMessage.
    void
    turnManager()
    Turn bookkeeping:
    - checks common/personal/adjacency scores and updates them accordingly.
    boolean
    update(ViewMessage<?> msg)
    Forward a ViewMessage to the GameController.
    Executes the corresponding onMessage() method if it exists.
    This method is synchronized over the GameController instance only if it's a message it can handle.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController(GameModel model, int lobbyID)
      Initialize the controller with the given model and start the game.
      This constructor is used when the game is started from the lobby, whether it's a new game or a recovery.
      Parameters:
      model - Model instance to run
      lobbyID - Lobby identifier, used to close lobby on exit

    • GameController

      public GameController(GameModel model)
      Mock GameController constructor for testing purposes.
      This hooks empty listeners to the model to avoid problems when it tries to send data to a client
      Parameters:
      model - Model instance to run

  • Method Details

    • needRefill

      public boolean needRefill()
      Check if the board needs to be refilled according to the rules (either empty or all tiles isolated)
      Returns:
      True if a refill is needed, false otherwise

    • calculateAdjacency

      public int calculateAdjacency(Shelf shelf)
      Compute shelf adjacency score for the final score.
      Parameters:
      shelf - Shelf to check for the score
      Returns:
      Integer score assigned for adjacent similar tiles in the given shelf

    • turnManager

      public void turnManager()
      Turn bookkeeping:
      - checks common/personal/adjacency scores and updates them accordingly.
      - refills the board if needed.
      - checks if the game is on its last turn.

    • nextPlayerSetter

      public void nextPlayerSetter()
      Move over to the next player.
      If this looped back to the first player during the last turn, end the game.

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      Notify the views of the game ending.
      Sets the model's state to GameEnded and shuts down the lobby.

    • update

      public boolean update(ViewMessage<?> msg)
      Forward a ViewMessage to the GameController.
      Executes the corresponding onMessage() method if it exists.
      This method is synchronized over the GameController instance only if it's a message it can handle.
      Parameters:
      msg - Message to forward
      Returns:
      true if the message was forwarded succesfully, false otherwise

    • onMessage

      public void onMessage(ChatMessage chat)
      Respond to a chat message received from a client
      Parameters:
      chat - Message contents

    • onMessage

      public void onMessage(MoveMessage msg)
      Respond to a move message received from a client
      In case of error, notify the client through the model with a ServerMessage.
      Parameters:
      msg - Move received

    • onMessage

      public void onMessage(DebugMessage message)
      Respond to a debug ping from a client by notifying it back.
      Parameters:
      message - Ping message
